body_html: I heard GCC 6 has function multiversioning (if that is what you meant, e.g.: https://lwn.net/Articles/691932/ ), but I am not an expert of compilers and I do not know the details of the process creating Python wheels to be sure multiversioning can be used.

body: I heard GCC 6 has function multiversioning (if that is what you meant, e.g.: https://lwn.net/Articles/691932/ ), but I am not an expert of compilers and I do not know the details of the process creating Python wheels to be sure multiversioning can be used.
